traits.name: Slash
traits.desc: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (6d8 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Force Pull
traits.desc: DC 16 vs Strength saving throw, ranged 15 ft., one target. Hit: the target is pulled 10 ft. towards you.

traits.name: Spellburner
traits.desc: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 29 (8d6 + 1) force damage, and the creature loses their lowest unspent spell slot.
